name: 2048 Balance (Demo)
description:
Demo version of 2048 Balance, a balancing game that uses the 2048 mechanics.  A casual, time-killing game that could be a bit challenging. 

Drop the block on to the platform, block with same number merges.  

Don't let any blocks fall off and try to reach 2048!

---------------------------------------------------------

Control:

1.  Use red slider or press up/down to rotate the block

2.  Use blue slide or press left/right to aim the block

3.  Tap anywhere or press space to drop

----------------------------------------------------------

Early access version will be available for android in google play soon.  Please kindly share with us if you notice any bugs or have any suggestions! 

Thanks for trying this game.
